name: RampantFixed
title: Rampant, fixed
author: Dimm2101 (fixes), Veden (Rampant)
description:
Based on Rampant 1.1.1 (new AI and enemies). 
 1. AI significantly rewritten, gameplay different. Can attack from afar. Improved search for a passage in the defense. By default, it does not populate the entire map 
 2. +2 Factions. Can mutate existing nests. Mixed attacks from different factions. Can be combined with nests of other enemies  
 Details on the mod portal
